attributes.action: A migrant in the UK wants to speak in The Parlament before The Lords
attributes.background: They want to negotiate with the immigrants who live in the United Kingdom when Article 50 is invoked ... Silenced immigrants have not allowed us to say our opinion at the polls it is right that the parliament that will tell our destiny listen to my story and the Of thousands of Europeans with me

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You can find out how to contact a member of the House of Lords here:

http://www.parliament.uk/business/lords/whos-in-the-house-of-lords/get-in-touch-with-members/
